title: Change this browser from Russian to Englsih

title: Unable to sign in to google Account
content:
I have been unable to sign in to google accounts on 3rd party websites for a while now. I'm using firefox develloper edition. i do not have this issue with normal firefox

every time i try to sign in i get redirected to https://support.google.com/accounts/a.../32050?hl=en

Heres some of the things i tried:

  • Clear cache and cookies
  • "repair" Firefox from the uninstaller
  • Reinstall Firefox

To be honest it is quite a bit annoying and i cannot find a solution thanks in advance for any help
creator: manu2107el

title: How do I restore my profile using "Old Firefox Data" after during a "Refresh" in Windows 10
content: Hello, looking for help on firefox in windows 10; How do I restore my profile using "Old Firefox Data" after during a "Refresh" in Windows 10 Any assistance would be greatly appreciated. Daniel Leese
creator: dleese42499

title: SOMEONE is CONTROLING MY FIREFOX WITHOUT MY PERMISSION!
content:
Information Your browser is being managed by your organization.

I am 75 years old. I am RETIRED there is NO REASON for an organization to be in CONTROL of ANYTHING on my computer. How do I STOP THIS?

I don't know if this is related or not, but Something is BLOCKING my ability to use check boxes or circles. Sometimes I can see the box but my response is NOT VISIBLE. Tonight I was trying to complete a survey and the questions were visible but I was COMPLETELY UNABLE to see the answer boxes/circles. Sometimes they would be briefly visible when the page initially opened but QUICKLY DISAPPEARED and were NOT identifiable by manipulating my cursor using mouse, space bar, or tab bar.

I have stayed with Firefox as my default browser for several DECADES and PREFER NOT to change now. BUT this MUST STOP!
creator: palladinrn1

title: I sign into sync, but my browser doesn't sync ....
content:
This is really frustrating. So I have been using ff sync for 20 years and have never seen anything like this. I sign into ff sync and it appears to work, but then my browser does not actually start syncing. I try again and again. Same thing. I even tried to sign in on my android phone. Same thing! It signs in to accounts.firefox.com just fine. Otherwise I 'd not be able to be logged into this forum... But my browser is not signing into sync.

What the heck is going on?
creator: xelectron

title: Performans Yavaşlığı
content:
Merhaba,

Mozilla Firefox tarayıcısını kullanırken aşırı yavaş çalıştığını fark ettim. Sayfaların yüklenmesi uzun sürüyor ve bazı özellikler beklenenden daha yavaş yanıt veriyor. Tarayıcıyı güncelledim ve önbelleği temizledim, ancak sorun devam ediyor. Bu konuda yardımcı olmanızı rica ediyorum.

yaklaşık son 1 - 1.5 aydır bu sorunu yaşıyorum daha öncesinde bu sorun mevcut değildi.

Teşekkürler.
creator: muzaffertopalbekiroglu
